item.title: Metador - the HTML metadata retriever library
item.description: Metador is an easy to use library for retrieving the META tags of an HTML page, for use in an Android mobile application. It can be used in scenarios where the developer would have to extract the information from a list of HTML pages. HTML metadata may contain very useful information, such as a title, a text summary, an associated image, etc. To use Metador, you create a Metador object through the associated Metador.
